title: remove pdf files from website
description:
While working on LUCENE-3166, I started thinking we should remove the PDF files from the docs/website.

just another thing to simplify life.

comments.content:
+1 - I will handsomely reward anyone that finds anyone that has ever made use of these pdf files...

Next we just drop forrest, and I get really happy...
comments.author: Mark Miller

comments.content: OK, I will nuke them and see if someone cashes in on the reward
comments.author: Robert Muir
